text: A capability is an ability that an organization, person, or system possesses. Capabilities are typically expressed in general and high-level terms and typically require a combination of organization, people, processes, and technology to achieve. For example, marketing, customer contact, or outbound telemarketing.The Open Group Architecture Framework (TOGAF 9.1) ==References== == External links == *TOGAF 9.1 Online Category:Strategic management
title: Capability-oriented strategic modelling
